commenter_a: Somebody went postal in Orlando last night. Another mass shooting, our country has so many. I have to have a licence to drive a car, to prove I am not so crazy as to kill people with it needlessly. But any idiotic crazy person can own a gun, or lots of them, with no accountability. The second amendment was not written to cover high capacity assault rifles, designed only for killing people.
